ModMetaData.name: Moonguard Artifacts
ModMetaData.author: ShadowSWilliam
ModMetaData.description: This mod adds special variants of the Persona Monosword dubbed Moonguards. Each Moonguard's personality is pre-defined and their stats vary aswell. Some are better than the default Persona Monosword in every regard, while others only excel in specific areas and are inferior compared to other stats.
